Let's learn how to describe people.
She's friendly. She's got long red hair and a nice smile.
She's unfriendly. She's young and has straight black hair.
She's got short gray hair and is talkative.
He's funny. He's got nice hair and dresses well.
He's smart. He's got glasses and short brown hair.
He's got a nice smile and is friendly.
He's quiet. He's got wavy hair and nice eyes.
He's got short hair and a mustache. He's a sharp dresser.
